title: Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | SB 1.7.8 | 11-12-2021
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: ओम अज्ञान तिमिरान धस्या ज्ञानान जनिशलाकया चक्षुरुन मीलितं येना तस्मै श्री गुरवे नमः
नमा ओम विष्णु पादाया कृष्ण प्रेष्ठाय भूतले श्रीमते भक्ति वेदांत स्वामिन नितिनामिने
नमस्ते सारस्वते देवे गौरवाणी प्रचारिने निर्विशेश शुन्यवादी पाश्चात्य देशतारिने
जय श्री कृष्ण चैतन्या प्रभू नित्यानन्दा श्री अद्वैत गदाधर श्रीवास अधी गौरभक्त वृंदा
हरे कृष्णा हरे कृष्णा कृष्ण कृष्णा हरे हरे
हरे राम हरे रामा राम रामा हरे हरे
ओम नमो भगवते वासु देवाया
नारायणम नमस कृत्या नरम चेवन अरोत्तमं
देवीम सरस्वतीम भ्यासम ततो जयम उदीरयेत
In this session we will be discussing from the 8th verse
of the 7th chapter of the 1st canto of Srimad Bhagavatam
ससम्हिताम भागवतीम कृत्वानु क्रम्य चात्मजम
शुकं अध्यापयाम आस निवृत्ति निर्यतं मुनिही
The meaning of this verse is
The great sage Vyasadeva, after compiling the Srimad Bhagavatam
and revising it, taught it to his own son
Shri Shukadeva Goswami
who was already engaged in self-realization
It's a very very important verse
What is this verse telling us?
That Vyasadeva, he compiled the Srimad Bhagavatam
under the instruction of Narada
He revised it because it's a very big work
18,000 verses
And he also taught it to his own son
Shri Shukadeva Goswami
Now what is the special thing about
Vyasadeva teaching his own son Shukadeva Goswami?
If you remember, the beginning of the Bhagavatam
It is explained
Shukadeva Goswami walked away from home
without caring to undergo any samskaras
Including the Upanayana samsara
He just ignored
because only after Upanayana
one approaches a bona-fide spiritual master
to learn the Vedas
to learn the scriptures
to learn the spiritual knowledge but shukadeva swami just didn't care for any of those formalities why
because he was already engaged in self-realization he was a liberated soul by birth
it's very very very rare somebody is born liberated generally everyone is born
as a conditioned soul the very reason for birth is that one is conditioned by material energy
or material nature but shukadeva swami was a liberated soul by birth so he didn't have to
undergo any study of the vedas now why did he actually learn the srimad bhagavatam that's the
question that will be raised in the next words but here srila prabhupada is the one who is
explains about the significance of vyasa deva compiling the bhagavatam and teaching it to his
own son so srila prabhupada says in the purport srimad bhagavatam is the natural commentation on
the brahma sutras compiled by the same author natural commentary on the brahma sutras if you
are aware the brahma sutras or the vedanta sutras are the most scholarly presentation by vyasa deva
the essence of the vedas is given in the
upanishads the essence of the upanishads is given in the vedanta sutra or the brahma sutra
so brahma sutra is like the cream of the cream
and that brahma sutra is not easy to understand even for learned vedic scholars
so vyasa deva himself wrote a commentary on this vedanta sutra in the form of
srimad bhagavatam and it's called natural because the author of both the vedanta sutra
and its commentary the srimad bhagavatam is the same person srila vyasa deva
this brahma sutra or vedanta sutra is meant for those who are already engaged in self-realization
श्रीमद्भागवत्म इस सो मेड डाट वन बिकम्स एट वन्स एंगेज़ इन पाथ ऑफ सेल्फ रियलाइजेशन सिपली बाई यूरिंग द टॉपिक्स
कि इस स्पेसिफिक स्टैंडर्ड द श्रीमद्भागवत्म जनरली वन स्टडीस द वेदास एंड ग्राइजुली एलिवेट्स इस कांशियसनेस टो कम टो द लेवल ऑफ
इंक्वायरिंग इंटो स्पिरिट्यूअल सब्जेक्ट मैटर ब्रह्म जिग्ञासा अ कि वन गोस्त रूप कर्म कांडा ज्ञान कांडा उपासन कांडा एंड देन कम्स बाट भागवत्म
इस अबाव एंड बियॉंड ऑल दीस अदर लिटरेचर इट्स ए वेरी यूनिक लिटरेचर देर फॉर श्रीला प्रभावपाद सेस यह ऑल दो इट इस एस्पेशियली इट मींस द भागवत्म इस एस्पेशियली मेंट फॉर द परम
हमस अब दोस्तों टोटली इंगेज्जेड इन सेल्फ रियलाइजेशन परम हमसे नौटिंग टो डू विद मंडेन सब्जेक्ट्स
मेटीरियल सब्जेक्ट मैटर द नाथिंग टो डू विद इट सो द या जस्ट इंट्रेस्टर इन ट्रांसेंडेंस इन स्पिरिचुअल सब्जेक्ट
मैटर ब्रह्म जिग्ञासा बाड़ भागवतं इस सच दाट इट वर्क्स इंटो द डेप्स ओफ दी हार्ट्स ओफ दोस वो मेडी वर्ली में
आर्डियरी पीपल वो हैव नो आइडिया ऑफर एस ट्रांसेंडेंस इवन सच पीपल इट दे गिव अटेंशन टो हीरिंग भागवतं इट इस गोइंट वर्क इन देप्स ओफ दी हार्ट्स इन सच वई दाट एटर बिंग अबाउट एन इमीडियट ट्रांसफॉर्मेश
है जिस वाइटर डिजीस शिंपली इंट्रस्टेड इन सेंस एंजॉयमेंट इचीज द वेरी काउस बॉन्ड इच फूलिश्ट रिपींट लेट मी एंजॉय व्हाट इज एंजॉयमेंट गेटिंग डीपर एंड डीपर
इन देश मैटीरियल वर्ड मेटीरियल बॉंडिज टाइप इन और नो अब आज वॉट इंस्टॉल्ड स्वत्र आ ग्रामा बंधन और मैटीरियल
material bondage material bondage means we have lost our freedom natural freedom which is there in our
spiritual existence we are bound up by this body we are bound up by the laws of material nature
just like I cannot eat whatever I want anytime I want as much as I want I cannot
eat if I don't obey or follow the laws of material nature then over eating causes indigestion
or eating the wrong thing it infects some part of the body and we get diseased and
we suffer in so many ways due to diseases so like this we have lost our natural freedom
because
material bondage and what is this proof of material bondage this very material body
every body material body is a limitation the soul is completely free to travel anywhere in the whole creation
but being bound up by this body we cannot just go anywhere and everywhere and the means of travel also
is fixed according to the body is it not birds can fly human beings cannot fly unless they use a
machine called an aeroplane or they use some yogic Siddhi otherwise they cannot fly the aquatics can
live in the water but they cannot live on the land we live on the land but we cannot live in water
so like this there are so many limitations so many limitations so this called uh bondage and
bondage also dictates sense gratification we are under illusion or uh this thing that since
gratification will solve my problem but the remedial measure for all these problems is there in
the bhagavatam was a liberated soul from the very beginning of his life but his father taught him
um because this is the subject matter for the Paramahamsas for those who are liberated Souls
this mundane Scholars
they have their own empirical methods of determining how old is some scripture
or how many years back something was spoken
about history itself
there are so many opinions
according to their own theories
but
from the text of the Bhagavatam
it is very clear that
this Bhagavatam is compiled before the disappearance of King Pariksit
and after the departure of lord krishna
so this is all described in the bhagavatam itself very clearly when Maharaj pariksit was ruling
the world as the king of Bharata Varsha he chastised the personality of Kali Kali Purusha that is
described in the first canto of the shreemad bhagavata according to revealed scriptures and astrological
calculation the age of kali is in its five thousandth year now five thousand years have already passed
since kali yuga began therefore srimad bhagavatam is compiled not less than five thousand years ago
see how shila prabhupada is arriving at this figure of five thousand years old
based on the description in the bhagavatam itself
mahabharata was compiled before srimad bhagavatam and the puranas were compiled before mahabharata
vyasa deva is the one who compiled all this so he compiled the puranas then he compiled the
mahabharata then he compiled the srimad bhagavatam that is an estimation of the date of compilation
of the different vedic literatures especially the puranas mahabharata and bhagavatam are very
important because they describe the activities of the personality of the srimad bhagavatam
called krishna the activities of the person is very rarely found in very literature
lot of description is there about the impersonal feature but that is the subordinate aspect of
the absolute truth the impersonal brahman is subordinate to the personality of god
the synopsis of srimad bhagavatam
was given before the detailed description under instruction of narada narada gave the synopsis
of bhagavatam to vyasa deva and vyasa deva expanded that and presented the srimad bhagavatam for our
understanding in an elaborate way srimad bhagavatam is the science for following the path of nivritti
marga that's why it was said nivritta niratam munihi shukadeva swamy was liberated soul is the path of liberation
the path of pravritti marga was condemned by narada narada while instructing vyasa deva he said this
pravritti marga simply increases aggravates the diseased condition whereas nivritta marga
relieves one of the disease material disease and also on the path of liberation one becomes freed
from all the material miseries that was described in the previous two verses
so this path of nivritti marga is the natural sorry the path of pravitamarga is the natural
inclination for all conditioned souls the theme of the srimad bhagavatam is the cure
of the materialistic disease of the human being or stopping completely the pants of material existence
See when we take up this nivritti mark then immediately the cure is

वैभे मर्त शिमपा वतन इसकंप्रीट लिए आप हिस्सीन क्रेडिफिकेशन इतना है एंगेज़मेंट वे सेंसन्ज से
भक्ति बाय विच अवर सेंसेस बिकाम प्यूरिफाइड एंड प्रॉपरली सिचुएटेड इन ट्रांसेंडेंस एंड स्टॉप यह थैंक यू वरी मच हरी कृष्ण
